description: Erection of a four storey side extension to No. 20 Stamford Brook Avenue, following the demolition of No. 18 Stamford Brook Avenue, and associated internal alterations.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0001 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0002 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0010 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0011 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0201 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0202 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0203 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0204 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0205 (P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0206 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0210 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0211 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0212 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0220 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0221 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0222 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0301 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0302 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0303 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0304 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0305 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0306 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0310 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0311 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0312 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0320 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0321 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-0322 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2001 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2003 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2005 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2006 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2010 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2011 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2012 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2013 (Rev P01); GHA-XX-XX-DR-A-2020 (Rev P01); Design and Access Statement; Arboricultural Report; Received:  20 June 2022) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - All Non-Road Mobile Machinery (NRMM) of net power of 37kW and up to and including 560kW used during the course of the demolition, site preparation and construction phases of the development hereby approved shall comply with the emission standards set out in chapter 7 of the GLA's supplementary planning guidance (SPG) 'Control of Dust and Emissions During Construction and Demolition' dated July 2014, or subsequent guidance. Unless it complies with the standards set out in the SPG, no NRMM shall be on site, at any time, whether in use or not. The developer shall keep an up to date list of all NRMM used during the demolition, site preparation and construction phases of the development on the online register at https://nrmm.london/.

Condition : 7 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Condition : 8 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the four storey side extension hereby approved.

Condition : 9 - The four storey side extension hereby approved shall form and be used as part of the original house at No. 20 Stamford Brook Avenue only and shall not be subdivided into a self-contained house or flats without obtaining planning permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, prior to the completion of substructure of the extensions hereby approved, full details of the waste and recycling storage with reduced height and green roof design have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 11 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, prior to the completion of substructure of the extensions hereby approved, full details of side entrance door and side boundary wall (with reduced height) to be erected within or on the perimeters of the site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The details as approved shall be erected at the site before the extension is occupied and retained thereafter in accordance with the approved details.
